{"tenantFilter":[{"label":"Template Tenant","value":"Template Tenant"}],"excludedTenants":[],"description":"

CIPP Recommended Standards - Medium Impact

This standard allows you to increase a customers security with a medium impact. Users might notice changes such as not being able to share with everyone by default, or not being able to automatically approve apps.

You are able to set allowed applications under the standard \"Require Admin Consent for Applications\"
